effect_entries.effect:
Inflicts [regular damage]{mechanic:regular-damage}.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to [confuse]{mechanic:confuse} the target.

This move can hit Pokémon under the effect of []{move:bounce}, []{move:fly}, or []{move:sky-drop}.

During []{move:rain-dance}, this move has 100% accuracy.  During []{move:sunny-day}, this move has 50% accuracy.
effect_entries.short_effect: Has a $effect_chance% chance to confuse the target.
